item.description:
If you have wanted to get your dog into a fun, easy sport, this is the time to do it!
Performance Plus Dog Training of Taunton, MA is excited to be hosting a day of FUN with discs and dogs! Ron Watson and Apryl Lea hail from Kingston NY with their pack of 12 disc dogs, most of them rescues! Ron and Apryl have competed in freestyle disc dog competitions on a national level. Both of them love teaching the sport to dogs and people alike. Their fun and upbeat approach makes the learning easy and comfortable for both ends of the leash.
The Seminar Includes:
Multiple types of throws
Throwing accuracy, distance and speed
Flatwork maneuvers and tricks
Questions & Answers
Individual instruction time with Ron or Apryl
Each segment of the seminar will allow for plenty of individual practice time with your dog. The goal of the seminar is to introduce handlers to safe disc dog skills and set teams up for success with the proper foundation. Experienced teams will learn to increase their dogs' motivation, solve problem areas, and increase their repertoire of freestyle maneuvers.
For more info call 508-821-7587
Check out www.performanceplusk9.com for a registration form and more info!
item.name: Disc Dog Seminar with Pawsitive Vybe
